item.title: 最新研究显示，全球最便宜的 20 座城市中有 9 座位于亚洲。但亚洲大陆也有一些世界上最昂贵的大都市👇。

item.title: "对第三方选民最大的误解是，如果他们不把选票投给第三方候选人，他们就会把选票投给民主党或共和党"。@daniella_raz在 "制衡 "节目中与@imkahloon对话 🎧
item.description:
“The biggest misconception about third-party voters is this idea that if they had not cast a ballot for a third-party candidate, they would have instead voted for a Democrat or Republican.” @daniella_raz talks to @imkahloon on “Checks and Balance” https://t.co/DKisMwdCfc 🎧

— The Economist (@TheEconomist) March 13, 2024

item.title: 本周的 "制衡 "节目： 🎧我们的记者考察了参选的第三方候选人🎧我们回到了第三方成为焦点的另一个时代🎧@daniella_raz解释了人们对第三方的误解之处
item.description:
This week on “Checks and Balance”: https://t.co/E7GKJsQs2t

🎧 Our correspondent examines the third-party candidates in the running
🎧 We go back to another time when third parties were in the spotlight
🎧 @daniella_raz explains what people get wrong about them

— The Economist (@TheEconomist) March 13, 2024

item.title: "他是个超级领袖他必须让人们相信他能在水上行走。"埃隆-马斯克表现得好像他肩负着拯救人类的使命。他的傲慢可能会有糟糕的结局👇。

item.title: 芬太尼现在几乎可以肯定是 18 至 49 岁美国人的最大杀手。经济学家可能终于找到了危机的令人信服的解释👇。
item.description:

— The Economist (@TheEconomist) March 13, 2024

item.title: 本周末，俄罗斯人将在一场虚假的总统选举中投票。这场骗局是在谋杀和镇压中进行的 👇
item.description:

item.title: 据统计，TikTok 是全球下载量最高的应用程序。它可能很快就会从屏幕上消失。要想留在屏幕上，它必须与中国保持距离 👇
item.description:
By one measure TikTok is the world’s most downloaded app. It may soon start disappearing from screens. To stay on them, it must distance itself from China https://t.co/AE1YYB7388 👇

— The Economist (@TheEconomist) March 12, 2024

item.title: 社交媒体正在经历一场深刻却鲜为人知的变革。令人震惊的是，社交媒体不再具有社交属性。潮流正在转向 👇
item.description:
Social media are undergoing a profound but little-noticed transformation. Strikingly, they are no longer very social. The tide is turning https://t.co/P9v6qbkzhA 👇

— The Economist (@TheEconomist) March 12, 2024

item.title: 漫威的衰落令人惊讶：长期以来，这个品牌似乎所向披靡。迪斯尼内部人士认为，漫威的衰落有几个原因 👇
item.description:

item.title: 印度的美元富豪往往不会成为头条新闻，也不会宣传自己的财富，但他们对国家经济的影响却非常大。新富豪与旧富豪完全不同 👇
item.description:
India’s dollar millionaires tend not to make headlines or advertise their wealth, but they have an outsize influence on their country’s economy. And the new rich are nothing like the old https://t.co/KoFCh2Yfvr 👇

— The Economist (@TheEconomist) March 12, 2024

item.title: 但是，我们有充分的理由相信，未来将出现更多的供应、更低的价格，以及最重要的是更多的竞争👇。
item.description:
The limited volumes and high cost of weight-loss drugs mean they are unobtainable for many who could benefit from them.

But there are good reasons to think that the future will see expanded supply, low prices, and—most importantly—more competition https://t.co/ENRwgzjR6Y 👇

— The Economist (@TheEconomist) March 12, 2024

item.title: 市场正在飙升。但这并不意味着匆忙买入股票就是明智之举。接下来发生的事情不太可能让投资者满心欢喜👇。
item.description:
Markets are soaring. But that does not make it wise to rush out and buy stocks. What happens next is unlikely to fill investors with glee https://t.co/Nruz1OF4yb 👇

— The Economist (@TheEconomist) March 12, 2024
